title: Account Got Hacked; Being Moved To Japan
body:
So last night I was queuing up for a game and I got kicked out of the lobby with the message that the account had been logged into from a different location. I sent a support ticket saying what happened and looking back, I should have changed my password then, but I didn't. This morning when I tried to log on, the username/password combination was invalid and when I looked at lolprofile.net, there was an identical account to mine on the japan servers with two games played with players with asian characters in their names. I am pretty sure someone hacked my account and is trying to move it to the japan servers so I contacted Riot support for help but they haven't responded. I really don't want to lose my account and would appreciate any help or tips to recover it.
Account name is "i am rocks".

replies.body:
Losing access to an account is quite frustrating, I know from personal experience. Sit tight and we'll have an account specialist get back to you in your ticket as soon as possible. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
One question: will the person contact me through email?
Yes. That's actually why we ask for your email when you submit an account recovery ticket.
